com.tabuto.j2dgf.gui
Class J2DCanvasPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.tabuto.j2dgf.gui.J2DCanvasPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
JSLSimulationView
public class J2DCanvasPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer

Abstract class J2DCanvasPanel extends JPanel.

This Class implements a CavasPanel where the sprite "live".
This Class should be a Control layer for the Game model Use this class simply extends it and call the drawStuff(Game) method

Version:
0.7.2
Author:
tabuto83
See Also:
CollisionDetector, Game2D, CollisionDetector, Sprite, Group, Serialized Form
